1.title: WE CARE FOR THE COMMUNITY
1.description: Suggest ideas, discuss changes and influence the development of the game. Taking care of the players is our top priority.

2.title: NEXT GENERATION GAMEPLAY
2.description: Deep strategies, multiple opportunities and the unique character of each game. You can find all this in a next generation game which turns the concept of the card entertainment upside down.

3.title: AFFORDABLE AND FREE
3.description: Immerse yourself into a fascinating world absolutely for free. There is no need to build decks. Play freely and enjoy every moment of the game without a care.

4.title: FREEDOM OF COLLECTING
4.description: You will be able to change the visual style of different aspects of the game for yourself. It will be possible to trade collectibles with other players.

5.title: DEVELOPMENT OF CYBERSPORTS
5.description: Full-fledged in-game tournaments where virtual maps become the arena for real sporting feats. Become a part of the cybersports evolution.

6.title: SKILL OVER RANDOM
6.description: In this game, random yields in the face of true masters of card battles. Exalt your skill over random.
